modName: Legendary ArchMage - fix robes and simple Retex
summary:
fix and new set for archmage robes
-------------------------------------------------
nuovo set per le vesti dell'arcimago
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#ff7700]New version ->[/color][color=darkred]Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54206/?]Here[/url][/color][/size] [/center]

[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/35730-1-1375864585.jpg[/img][youtube]7HCx4GpfWS0[/youtube][/center]


[color=#ff7700][size=5][center]DESCRIPTION[/center][/size][/color]
[center]This mod fixes the archmage robes and improves the statistics,
There are 2 new sets in the safe located in the Arch-Mage's Quarters:
- The first set consists of cap, dress, gloves and boots Legendary version
- The second set consists of cap, dress, gloves and boots not enchanted
to better understand the differences look at the pictures above :)
This mod is compatible with all mods (100% guaranteed)

I also made a small and simple RETEX (optional files)
if you do not like my RETEX you can safely opt out of others, for example:
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6220//?]N-R HD Archmage Robes[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35089]Archmage of Winterhold HD Retexture[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34170]Archmage Robes Royal Retexture[/url][/center]


[color=#ff7700][size=5][center]INSTALLATION[/center][/size][/color][center]to install just unpack the rar package, extract the contents and overwrite the "Data" folder with the one in the directory of skyrim ;) [/center]
[center][b][color=#4169E1][Requires Skyrim patched to version 1.8.151.0.7 or 1.9.32.0.8][/color][/b][/center]

[center][/center]
[center][/center]
author: Master85
